adrFormatAddress: 203 W 20th St, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: I've been a customer for years and she is the best.  She was trained by the best and she knows hair care.  She is generous in her personality and truly loves what she does.  She is a professional that cares about you the person and that you look the best when you leave her salon.  She is awesome - welcoming and kind.  She believes in hair health, growth and maintenance.  She is great at cutting and styling hair and enjoys what she does. Thanks Cecilia for making me look amazing each and every time.

text.text: I've been a customer for years and she is the best.  She was trained by the best and she knows hair care.  She is generous in her personality and truly loves what she does.  She is a professional that cares about you the person and that you look the best when you leave her salon.  She is awesome - welcoming and kind.  She believes in hair health, growth and maintenance.  She is great at cutting and styling hair and enjoys what she does. Thanks Cecilia for making me look amazing each and every time.

originalText.text:
I had an appointment this past Saturday at salon Cecilia and it was amazing
from start to finish. All the staff working at the salon play a role in your overall experience. I was first greeted and given a warm welcome by Lou ann. She gave me a tour of the salon which is beautiful and has a cozy and intimate feel.
Miriam is one of the interns at the salon. She has a warm personality and as I waited for Cecilia to finish with a client she offered me refreshments and magazines. Whether I was in the chair being styled or under the dryer, Lou ann and Miriam would always ask if I needed anything.
My hair was styled by Cecilia, whom is very knowledgeable about the treatment and styling of natural hair. I have 4b/4c hair which is very thick with tight curls. I also have a tender scalp. Cecilia knew this detail without me telling her. She was very
gentle while styling my hair. I absolutely loved the end results of my two strand twist. I fully recommend going to salon Cecilia

originalText.text:
Ive been working for Salon Cecilia for awhile now , and honestly Cecilia Knight is the best mentor, boss, and friend anyone could ask for ! She's done nothing but prove to me that I can do anything I desire if I just put my mind into it ( with the help of her of course ðŸ˜‰) So anyone that's interested in trying the salon out , I Hightly suggest it ! Trust me , you won't be disappointed!
And the great thing about Salon Cecilia is that ANYONE can come and get their hair done , no matter who you are or what texture your hair is. There's a place here for everyone here at Salon Cecilia ðŸ’–

originalText.text:
I LOVE, LOVE,LOVE SALON CECILIA. I've been going there since she opened. I met Cecilia at John Atchison's salon. Once she opened her own salon I latched on. Cecilia takes good care of your hair.

Cecelia does such a great job in the overall care of my hair, that's why I keep going back. LaVerne P.

originalText.text: If you're looking for a conveniently located NYC salon where you and your soul can reboot, be sure to go to Salon Cecilia.  Over the years, my personal experience has been in a word--SOOTHING. I am also very excited to hear about Salon Cecilia's website, whose latest version is currently under construction, as well as upcoming spring and summer 2017 activities that include a kids and parents' workshop for multi-textured hair types and glam and grad packages for Class of 2017 grads and prom-goers and their dates.

text.text: If you're looking for a conveniently located NYC salon where you and your soul can reboot, be sure to go to Salon Cecilia.  Over the years, my personal experience has been in a word--SOOTHING. I am also very excited to hear about Salon Cecilia's website, whose latest version is currently under construction, as well as upcoming spring and summer 2017 activities that include a kids and parents' workshop for multi-textured hair types and glam and grad packages for Class of 2017 grads and prom-goers and their dates.
